description: Triangle T(n,k) giving coefficients in expansion of k! * Sum_{i=0..k} C(x-k,i) in powers of x.
mathematica: c[n_, k_] := Product[n-i, {i, 0, k-1}]/k!; row[n_] := CoefficientList[ n!*Sum[c[x-n, k], {k, 0, n}], x] // Reverse; Table[ row[n], {n, 0, 8}] // Flatten  (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Oct 04 2012 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Apr 16 2000
